body: All I see is regular users thinking, "I'm the boss. Why don't I just go and pretend this server is mine! I think I'll just tell the staff everything they ought to do and say, "U bad!" at what they don't do." Srsly, guys, you can offer feedback, but now all you're starting is a flame war. Tell the Mods what you think they could do better, and let them decide. Whatever happens, there's a reason for.

title: Guys, srsly

replies.body: Yeah, I guess you didn't directly say that, but once you suggest something, you demand it be carried out, as if you had more authority than the MODs. You also don't give specific feedback, you just say, "The mods are doing rly bad." just you cant expect mods always to listen to you, and if you're gonna give feedback, be specific. And no not just about you, about many people.
